name: socialtech
description: Repository for register & auth users. Also track events to external analytic service. # how to start - install  [docker](https://docs.docker.com/install/)(  [mac](https://docs.docker.com/docker-for-mac/), [windows](https://docs.docker.com/docker-for-windows/) ) with  [docker-compose](https://docs.docker.com/compose/install/) - make sure that **80** port in **127.0.0.1** interface is free - in the project dir run the next commands: ```bash docker-compose up -d open http://localhost ```
